item.description:
Larry F. is hosting this event
Email: mityfineone@comcast.net
 

 

The Athletic Events Committee is excited to offer a rock climbing adventure at The Boston Rock Climbing Gym in Woburn. This is one of the premier Rock Climbing Facilities in Massachusetts. Our adventure will be geared for beginners and no rock climbing experience is needed. We will be instructed on the basics of rock climbing and will have the chance to climb a number of inside rock climbing walls while harnessed. Each group of five will have the assistance of a “billet” person who will be handling the ropes for us and who can address any questions we may have. Special climbing shoes will be provided by the club.

Cost is $30 per person. Paypal is NOT accepted. Bring check made out to Sitzundjibers. Cancellations accepted until Tuesday, December 4. None after. No shows must still pay.
item.name: Beginers Rock Climb (Indoor)
